While Megatron is hovering in a set position Sunhawk took the 
opportunity to send 2 blasts at Megatron, each heading for an eye.

Sunhawk:  YOU'D BE SURPRISED THE THINGS PRISON AND LOOSING THE ONLY 
BOT YOU EVER LOVED CAUSE YOU TO FORGET!  I'M BEGGINING TO WISH I HAD 
FOUGHT FOR THE NEO-MAXIMALS!

OOC: If you haven't yet, then read his bio for a description of who 
the Neo-Maximals were.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Megatron --
> 
> Catching Hot Rod's words as Megatron continues rising up, wings 
> flapping madly, "Nice? Nice and dead are two words Maximals should 
> know abo--- grrr." He's cut off as Kup's magnetic grenade catches 
> his tail and destroys the lower half of it. He swirves left and 
> avoids Hot Rod's missiles, and flinches as one of Sunhawk's blasts 
> puts a hole through his wing, though not damaging his flying 
ability.
> 
> Megatron turns his head downward, and ignites his fire breath. He 
> sprays a layer of fire behind him in hopes of skewing the maximals' 
> aim a little.
